title: Unfair LeaverBuster?
body:
So I was playing LoL, had to have dinner. Had it in around 7 minutes.
Come back, disconnected. I reconnected, we finish the game and win. I arrive at homescreen to find that I have a 20 minute LeaverBuster when I havent gotten a ban in 3-4 months. Wtf riot? (Our team didnt suffer because I left,  and we won soon after I rejoined) I dont fancy myself a good league player and our team could do fine without me. So why the hell am I banned?

replies.body: One time I got disconnected at lvl 3 came back when rest of team was lvl 6 and started farming hard then finally we won the game I hard carried a feeder and played the rest of the 20 mins of that game and got leaver buster rip{{champion:25}}

yea mate same thing here I get dced at level 1 rejoin then get leaver buster also had 2 AFKs on my team 5 games today 4 AFKs and btw they cant remove leaver buster even if they wanted to automatic shit
yeah fuckin stupid riot should manage the cases themselves instead of having bots to do it for them
